cloudConfig:
#cloud-config

package_update: true
package_upgrade: false

packages:
  - python3
  - python3-pip
  - docker.io
  - chrony

write_files:
  - path: /usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
    permissions: '0755'
    owner: root:root
    content: |
      #!/bin/bash
      exec >> /var/log/post-deploy.log 2>&1
      echo "post deploy running"

      systemctl enable docker
      systemctl restart docker

      if id ubuntu >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        usermod -aG docker ubuntu
      fi

      echo "net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" > /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf
      sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf

      python3 -m pip install docker

      systemctl restart chrony

  - path: /etc/systemd/system/post-deploy.service
    permissions: '0644'
    owner: root:root
    content: |
      [Unit]
      Description=Post deploy setup
      After=network-online.target docker.service
      Wants=network-online.target

      [Service]
      Type=oneshot
      ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
      RemainAfterExit=yes

      [Install]
      WantedBy=multi-user.target

runcmd:
  - systemctl daemon-reload
  - systemctl enable post-deploy.service
name: kolla-failed-example

cloudConfig:
#cloud-config

package_update: true
package_upgrade: false

packages:
  - python3
  - python3-pip
  - docker.io

runcmd:
  - echo "Cloud-init test executed at $(date)" >> /var/log/init-test.log
  - systemctl enable docker
  - systemctl start docker
  - echo "Docker status:" >> /var/log/init-test.log
  - systemctl is-active docker >> /var/log/init-test.log
name: simple

cloudConfig:
#cloud-config

package_update: true
package_upgrade: false

packages:
  - python3
  - python3-pip
  - docker.io
  - chrony

write_files:
  # 리부팅 후 실행할 스크립트
  - path: /usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
    permissions: '0755'
    owner: root:root
    content: |
      #!/bin/bash
      exec >> /var/log/post-deploy.log 2>&1
      echo "[post-deploy] START at $(date)"

      # docker enable/start
      systemctl enable docker
      systemctl restart docker
      echo "[post-deploy] docker started"

      # ubuntu 계정 docker group 추가
      if id ubuntu >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        usermod -aG docker ubuntu
        echo "[post-deploy] ubuntu added to docker group"
      fi

      # enable ip_forward
      echo "net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" > /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf
      sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf
      echo "[post-deploy] ip_forward enabled"

      # python docker SDK
      python3 -m pip install docker
      echo "[post-deploy] pip docker installed"

      # chrony restart
      systemctl restart chrony
      echo "[post-deploy] chrony restarted"

      echo "[post-deploy] DONE at $(date)"

  # 리부팅 이후 post-deploy 실행하는 systemd unit
  - path: /etc/systemd/system/post-deploy.service
    permissions: '0644'
    owner: root:root
    content: |
      [Unit]
      Description=Run post-deploy script once after reboot
      After=network-online.target
      Wants=network-online.target

      [Service]
      Type=oneshot
      ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
      RemainAfterExit=yes

      [Install]
      WantedBy=multi-user.target


runcmd:
  # 이미 post-deploy가 실행된 경우 재실행 방지
  - if [ -f /var/lib/cloud/instance/post_done ]; then exit 0; fi

  # post-deploy 실행을 위한 systemd 등록
  - systemctl daemon-reload
  - systemctl enable post-deploy.service

  # 마커가 없는 경우: 첫 번째 부팅 → reboot
  - if [ ! -f /var/lib/cloud/instance/reboot_once ]; then \
        echo "first boot - marking and rebooting"; \
        touch /var/lib/cloud/instance/reboot_once; \
        reboot; \
    fi

  # (여기 도달하면 2차 부팅 이후)
  - touch /var/lib/cloud/instance/post_done
  - echo "post-deploy completed" >> /var/log/post-deploy.log
name: kolla

cloudConfig:
#cloud-config

write_files:
  - path: /tmp/test-cloud-init.txt
    owner: root:root
    permissions: '0644'
    content: |
      hello world from cloud-init

runcmd:
  - echo "runcmd is running" >> /tmp/test-runcmd.txt
name: simple2-linux

cloudConfig:
#cloud-config

write_files:
  - path: /tmp/test-cloud-init.txt
    owner: root:root
    permissions: '0644'
    content: |
      hello world from cloud-init

runcmd:
  - echo "runcmd is running" >> /tmp/test-runcmd.txt
name: simple2-windows(CRLF)

cloudConfig:
#cloud-config

package_update: true
package_upgrade: false

packages:
  - python3
  - python3-pip
  - docker.io
  - chrony
  - openvswitch-switch

write_files:
  - path: /usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
    owner: root:root
    permissions: '0755'
    content: |
      #!/bin/bash
      set -euo pipefail
      exec >> /var/log/post-deploy.log 2>&1
      echo "[post-deploy] START at $(date)"

      systemctl enable docker
      systemctl restart docker
      echo "[post-deploy] docker started"

      if id ubuntu >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        usermod -aG docker ubuntu
        echo "[post-deploy] ubuntu added to docker group"
      fi

      echo "net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" > /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf
      sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/99-ipforward.conf
      echo "[post-deploy] ip_forward enabled"

      python3 -m pip install docker
      echo "[post-deploy] pip docker installed"

      systemctl restart chrony
      echo "[post-deploy] chrony restarted"

      # 커널 모듈
      modprobe openvswitch || true
      modprobe vxlan || true

      # 영구 로드
      echo -e "openvswitch\nvxlan" > /etc/modules-load.d/openvswitch.conf

      # 서비스
      systemctl enable openvswitch-switch
      systemctl start openvswitch-switch

      # br-ex 생성
      ovs-vsctl --may-exist add-br br-ex

      echo "[post-deploy] DONE at $(date)"

  - path: /etc/rc.local
    owner: root:root
    permissions: '0755'
    content: |
      #!/bin/bash
      if [ ! -f /var/log/post-deploy.done ]; then
        /usr/local/bin/post-deploy.sh
        RET=$?
        if [ $RET -eq 0 ]; then
          touch /var/log/post-deploy.done
          rm -f /etc/rc.local
        else
          echo "[rc.local] post-deploy failed ($RET)" >> /var/log/post-deploy.log
        fi
      fi
      exit 0

runcmd:
  - systemctl enable rc-local || true
  - systemctl start rc-local || true
name: rc.local version
